left.title: Taxes on Single-Use Plastics
left.body: To discourage business from using single-use plastics in packaging, this proposal would impose taxes on companies that manufacture items that can only be used once. Companies argue that they would lose buisness and money as a result.

right.title: Increase Funding for Single Stream Recycling Initiatives
right.body: A new public survey suggests the largest barrier to recycling is convenience. This proposal would increase government support for public recyling services that does not include sorting of materials.
